function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of specific pcr conditions for detecting viruses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of viral rna samples","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Verification of specificity and sensitivity of rna sequencing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling and processing of contaminated wastewater samples may pose a risk of exposure to infectious viral rna","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of wastewater samples could potentially expose individuals to infectious viral material","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in testing procedures and analysis methods for detecting coronavirus genetic material in environmental samples","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the distribution and survival of sars-cov-2 in the aquatic environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 via feces in wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of infection spread in a population","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restrictions on levels of crowding on public transport","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring people for high temperatures or signs of illness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in maintaining the supply of vital food and medicine due to panic buying and disrupted supply chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High concentration of people in cities limiting the ability to travel to alternative sources of supply","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of hospitals reaching capacity and frontline medical personnel facing scarcity of resources and access to necessary items","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detailed personal location data could be misused for tracking individuals without their consent, leading to privacy violations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased surveillance and tracking of individuals may lead to a sense of intrusion and loss of personal freedom","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for misuse of personal health data for discriminatory practices, including employment, insurance, and access to resources","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High transmission risk in densely populated cities impacting community well-being","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of smart city technologies due to lockdown and reduced city activity","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Questionable research practices in dutch institutes","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data sharing statements from covid-19 trials","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Researchers unwilling to share data leading to lack of transparency in clinical trials","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accountability for poorly designed clinical trials and wasteful research","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of open science without concrete efforts to improve research quality","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Flawed or potentially fraudulent studies being used in meta-analyses to promote ivermectin as a wonder drug","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preprints with impossible numbers and duplicate data circulating online without formal retraction","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of scrutiny and blind trust in academic research culture","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spreading of disinformation through social media and mainstream media","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Amplification of flawed trial data through unreliable meta-analyses","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failures in peer review leading to publication of low-quality or misleading research","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unproven treatments being peddled by influential figures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scandals involving faked research data eroding trust in peer review and scientific integrity","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dissemination of unsubstantiated claims about the effectiveness of ivermectin in treating covid-19","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate data from the now-discredited surgisphere database influencing treatment recommendations and national policies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rollout of mass drug-administration campaigns in response to unsubstantiated recommendations, causing diversion of drug supplies from neglected disease programs","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preprints with questionable or fraudulent information being used to support ineffective treatments","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dissemination of preprints without critical review or verification","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of disinformation through preprints and press releases","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Publication of incorrect or misleading information","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through research activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preprints with inaccurate information leading to misguided policies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on preprints without comprehensive review","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dissemination of unvetted preprints","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misleading or false information spread through preprints","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear responsibility for managing and evaluating preprints","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High volume of preprints and papers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty carrying out face-to-face surveys during peak breakout of covid-19 and subsequent epidemic prevention periods","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict epidemic prevention and control measures limiting the scope of surveys","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant differences in people’s habits of using existing community service facilities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on virtual and physical space","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
